summary: A very simple .esp file to make wood, pelts, hides, tents and tanning racks lighter in Campfire. Compatible with Frostfall and Realistic Wildlife Loot.
descriptionHtml:
Hello!

[b]This mod only tweaks the weight of items in Campfire.
[/b]Full credits for this mod go to Chesko.

While playing with Campfire, I've noticed how often I'd be slowed down because of how much I carried. This was mostly because the most frequently used resources were quite heavy, so I've made them lighter, not too significantly, but enough to make a difference once you start stacking.


Below is a list of the specific changes.

[list]
[*]Linen wrap: 3 -> 1
[*]Branches: 0.5 -> 0.1
[*]Firewood and deadwood: 5 -> 1
[*]Tanning rack: 10 -> 6
[*]Deer hide (including Vale Deer hide): 2 -> 1
[*]Bear pelt (all kinds): 3 -> 2
[*]Wolf pelt (all kinds): 3 -> 1
[*]Werewolf pelt: 5 -> 2
[*]Goat hide: 1 -> 0.5
[*]Mammoth hide: 12 -> 5 (Realistic Wildlife Loot)
[/list]
[list]
[*]Leather tents (all kinds): -2
[*]Fur tents (all kinds): -6
[/list]
[b]Installation[/b]
Simply drop the file in your Skyrim/Data folder.
Load after Campfire and Realistic Wildlife Loot.

[b]Compatibility
[/b]This was made compatible with Realistic Wildlife Loot by Xion209.
This most likely conflicts with any mod that changes the weight of these items. Not yet sure how compatible this is with Animallica, if I notice any conflict I'll try to fix them.
author: Lyswenn
